casebody.data:
STATE
v.
David Woodard DANIEL 164A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 28, 2018 Ashleigh P. Dunston, Assistant Attorney General, Christopher W. Brooks, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Jay Vannoy, Attorney at Law, for Daniel, David Woodard.

*581The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 26th of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of June 2018."
